cohort: model MRI1 exists in two versions. at time of writing more data was available for earlier version whos control run is in CMIP1 database. The later model has two extra ocean levels and a modified ocean mixing scheme, its control run is in CMIP2 databas, the equillibrium climate sensitivites and transient climate responses of the two models are the same.
